title: Installation
content:
macOS Homebrew brew tap gravatalonga/ninja-lang brew install ninja-lang Linux Rpm / Yum To enable, add the following file /etc/yum.repos.d/fury.repo:
[fury] name=Gemfury Private Repo baseurl=https://yum.fury.io/gravatalonga/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0 Check if correctly created yum --disablerepo=* --enablerepo=fury list available
To install you only need run following command:
yum install ninja-lang APT To configure apt access, create a following file /etc/apt/sources.list.d/fury.list with content of :
deb [trusted=yes] https://apt.fury.io/gravatalonga/ / Or use this one line command:
echo "deb [trusted=yes] https://apt.fury.io/gravatalonga/ /" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/fury.list and them you can install
sudo apt install ninja-lang Windows We are working to be available for chocolatey
But for the moment we have available via manual installation.
Manual Manual Download Download from github
Source Code git clone https://github.com/gravataLonga/ninja cd ninja go build -o ninja-lang

title: Usage
content:
REPL Started as REPL with
ninja-lang Executing File ninja-lang my-code.ninja Inline code ninja-lang -e "var a = 1; a;"

title: Getting Started
content:
Tested Covered almost everything with unit testing Active Development Constantly update and improve performance at it core. Open Source Open source mean, we don’t hide any secret from you, also means you are more than welcome to contribute it. Introduction What It’s a general purpose programming language, but in focus to be used as backend for web. It was inspired in PHP and Javascript.
Why Ninja language was built with PHP and Javascript inspiration, in focus to be easy and simple to use.
